tool.name: A direct-input query
tool.help:
**What it does**
This service searches MEDLINE abstract(s).
LUCENE 2.4.0 has been used to index and search MEDLINE abstracts that are included in 2009 MEDLINE/PubMed Baseline Distribution.
-----
**How to use**
Please fill in a query, and click the execute button.
The results can be shown on the middle pane by clicking the eye symbol on the history pane.
-----
**Output**
PMID{tab}Title
